nodes.description: 2020年5月11日，Daesh在喀布尔北部地区发动路边炸弹袭击，造成4人受伤
nodes.support_text: four roadside bombs exploded in a northern district of Kabul, wounding four civilians including a child.

nodes.description: 2020年5月12日早间，武装分子袭击喀布尔巴奇尼国营医院，造成14人死亡
nodes.support_text: Gunmen stormed a maternity hospital in the western part of the Afghan capital, setting off a gun battle with the police and several people were reported wounded.

nodes.description: 2020年5月12日约一小时后，东部Nangarhar省葬礼发生自杀式爆炸，致24人死亡
nodes.support_text: Around an hour after the Kabul assault, a suicide bomber killed at least 24 people at the funeral of a local police commander in eastern Nangarhar province, according to provincial spokesman Ataullah Khogyani.

nodes.description: Daesh在2020年3月袭击喀布尔锡克庙，造成25人死亡
nodes.support_text: In March at least 25 people were killed by a gunman at a Sikh temple in Kabul in an attack later claimed by the group.

nodes.description: Daesh在2017年3月伪装成医生袭击喀布尔大型医院，杀害数十人
nodes.support_text: Daesh was also responsible for an infamous attack in March 2017 on one of the country's largest hospitals, when gunmen disguised as doctors stormed the Kabul building and killed dozens.
